backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files and their purposes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing car settings, UI overlays, and rendering the 3D scene with physics.
frontend/src/components/CarScene.tsx: Renders the 3D environment including lighting, ground, and a physics-driven car with wheel colliders.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with app title, logo, and buttons for toggling help and settings.
frontend/src/components/HelpOverlay.tsx: Modal overlay describing keyboard controls and Unity input equivalents.
frontend/src/components/Loader.tsx: Centered spinner shown while the 3D scene loads.
frontend/src/components/SettingsPanel.ts: Config panel providing sliders to adjust car physics values and persist changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and tracking login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module exporting nothing and indicating no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables, dark mode variants, and custom slider thumb styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radius, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a Unity-style 3D car controller app, its features, issues, and build state.
